name: Instant Pot® Tuna Ranch Casserole with Bacon
author: TaraJaworski
summary: This kid-friendly Instant Pot® tuna casserole is as fast to make as it is delicious.
ingredients: 20 ounces vegetable penne pasta (such as Birds Eye® Steamfresh® Veggie Made™)
4 wedges spreadable light Swiss cheese (such as The Laughing Cow®)
5 ⅓ ounces low-fat cottage cheese (such as Muuna®)
1 (1 ounce) package dry ranch dressing mix (such as Hidden Valley Ranch®)
2 slices fully cooked chicken bacon (such as Country Archer®)
directions: Layer onion, tuna, pasta, Swiss cheese, cottage cheese, ranch dressing mix, bacon, and beef broth, in that order, in a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®)
Select low pressure according to manufacturer's instructions with zero cooking time
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, 6 to 8 minutes, depending on desired pasta firmness
Release remaining pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes
